00056 /* Creation flags. */
00057 #define T_FPU     XNFPU
00058 /* <!> Low bits must conflict with XNFPU|XNSHADOW. */
00059 #define T_CPU(id) ((id) & 0xff)
00060

00063 #define T_DELAYED XNDELAY
00064 #define T_READY   XNREADY

00082 #define xnprio2rt(xnprio) (T_LOPRIO + (xnprio) - 1)

00111 typedef struct rt_task {
00112 
00113     unsigned magic;   /* !< Magic code - must be first */
00114 
00115     xnholder_t link;
00116 
00117     xntimer_t timer;
00118 
00119 #define link2rtask(laddr) \
00120 ((RT_TASK *)(((char *)laddr) - (int)(&((RT_TASK *)0)->link)))
00121 
00122     xnthread_t thread_base;
00123 
00124 #define thread2rtask(taddr) \
00125 ((taddr) ? ((RT_TASK *)(((char *)(taddr)) - (int)(&((RT_TASK *)0)->thread_base))) : NULL)
00126 
00127     rt_handle_t handle; /* !< Handle in registry -- zero if unregistered. */
00128 
00129     int suspend_depth;
00130 
00131     int overrun;
00132

00149 } RT_TASK;
